answers.answer: Good luck on you V-Day baby :)
Good luck and hope you have a safe delivery!!
Wish you well! Keep us posted on how things go.

question: I was admitted to hospital yesterday at 7:30am with signs of preeclampsia. They decided to enduce me and now (4:50am) still waiting to dialate enough to go to labor & delivery! Scared but excited to know he will be here soon!
title: looks like were gonna have a valentines baby!!
